delegate byte [] Tibia.Util.Proxy.PacketListener ( byte[]  packet  ) 

A generic function prototype for packet events.

Parameters:
packet The unencrypted packet that was recieved.
Returns:
The unencrypted packet to be forwarded. If null, the packet will not be forwarded.
